meanings.definition: A white powder used as a food additive.
meanings.sent1: The maltodextrin was added to the recipe to make the food taste better.
meanings.sent2: The chef sprinkled a pinch of maltodextrin into the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The maltodextrin in the cake mix decided to throw a party with the sugar and flour.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and airy as maltodextrin floating in the air.
meanings.sent5: The children watched in awe as the maltodextrin dissolved into the liquid, like magic.

meanings.definition: A type of carbohydrate derived from starch.
meanings.sent1: The maltodextrin in the energy drink provided a quick source of fuel.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often consume maltodextrin for a burst of energy during workouts.
meanings.sent3: The maltodextrin molecule high-fived the glucose molecule for being so energetic.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed through her mind like maltodextrin through the bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The maltodextrin acted as a speedy messenger, delivering energy to every cell in the body.
